settings.title: Where can I buy your ice cream?
settings.text:
For online deliveries, we're available throughout California, Nevada, Oregon, and Arizona. Our ice cream is delivered via frozen ground shipping packed with dry ice.

We're also available in-store at our partner locations! Please visit our Locations Page to see where we are locally available.

settings.title: Why is there a four (4) pack (16 single serve cups) minimum for each order?
settings.text:
We want to share more goodness with you!
But, there's the reality of the costs of storing, transporting, and shipping our premium ice cream to you, which unfortunately is very expensive.
We require a minimum of four (4) packs per order to keep our business viable, so that we can continue to bring more amazing ice cream and flavors to you. Each pack contains four (4) single serve cups of a single flavor, so four (4) packs will contain sixteen (16) single serve cups.

settings.title: Does your product contain artificial ingredients?
settings.text: Nope. Never. We only use all-natural ingredients.

settings.title: Is your ice cream 'sugar-free' or 'no sugar added'?
settings.text:
Our premium ice cream is not sugar-free because it contains sugars that are naturally present in the all-natural ingredients we use. So, our ice cream is classified as "no sugar added."
"No sugar added" means that no additional sugar is added to our ice cream. The only sugar in our ice cream is sugar that naturally occurs in our ingredients, such as sugars that is found in the real milk we use that comes from cows NOT treated with rBST. We also do not use jam, jelly, or concentrated fruit juice.

settings.title: How is your ice cream so sweet without sugar?
settings.text: We use a proprietary blend of Non-GMO allulose and Non-GMO stevia. Both are naturally occuring sugars that are not metabolized by the body.

settings.title: What is allulose?
settings.text: Allulose is a naturally occurring “rare sugar” that is found in small amounts in wheat, fruits (e.g., figs and raisins), and some other foods (e.g., molasses, maple syrup, and brown sugar). It has the same chemical formula as fructose, but is arranged differently. This difference in chemical structure prevents your body from processing allulose and is not metabolized by your body .

settings.title: What is stevia?
settings.text: Stevia is a naturally occurring sweetener found in the Stevia rebaudiana plant. Stevia provides sugar-like sweetness without the calories.

settings.title: Your ice cream contains fiber?
settings.text: It sure does. Our ice cream contains organic inulin, which is a prebiotic fiber. Inulin is derived from a variety of fruits, vegetables, and herbs, such as artichokes and chicory roots. Inulin is not digested or absorbed in the stomach. Inulin supports helpful bacteria growth in your digestive tract.

settings.title: Your ice cream contains protein?
settings.text: Yep. We use milk protein concentrate, which is a high protein spray dried powder made from skim milk, consisting mostly of the protein casein found in milk.

settings.title: How long should I wait to enjoy your ice cream out of the freezer?
settings.text: The best temperature to eat ice cream is around 5 to 10 degrees Fahrenheit. We're assuming your freezer is set between -10 to 0 degrees Fahrenheit. Our ice cream is real ice cream, so you could eat it right out of your freezer. But, if you wait about 5 minutes, it'll reach the optimal ice cream enjoying temperature.

settings.title: I just got my ice cream delivered, how long should I wait to dig in?
settings.text: Our ice cream is packed frozen, transported frozen, and delivered frozen. Ideally, our ice cream (like all premium ice cream) is best enjoyed between 5 to 10 degrees Fahrenheit. So, it's best if you leave it in your freezer to come up to temperature (around -10 degrees Fahrenheit) and then let it sit for a few minutes out of the freezer. A little patience goes a long way :)

settings.title: Where is your ice cream available for shipping?
settings.text:
We are available for shipping throughout California, Nevada, Oregon, and Arizona. When you place your order online and you're within our delivery area, a shipping button will appear in your cart.

We are constantly working to increase our shipping area, so please check our Locations Page for more information. Please also follow us on Facebook and Instagram and join our newsletter to find out where our ice cream becomes available.

settings.title: How much do you charge for shipping?
settings.text: For frozen ground shipping, we charge a flat-fee of $14.99 per order for shipping.

settings.title: When will I receive my order?
settings.text:
Orders are processed and shipped within 1-2 business days in the order they are received.

To help avoid shipment delays, orders are only processed and shipped Mondays-Thursdays and are subject to holiday schedule.

Orders received after 12pm PST Thursday will be processed and shipped the following Monday.

A notification email will be sent to you with tracking information once your package begins its transit. Transit times are between 1 to 4 business days.

settings.title: Do you ship to P.O. boxes?
settings.text: Unfortunately, we cannot ship to P.O. boxes.

settings.title: What's the delivery process like with Portobel?
settings.text: Portobel’s unique delivery process will deliver our ice cream to you in fabulous condition. You will be contacted the day before your delivery date to specify a 2-hour delivery window. Your ice cream will be packed frozen straight from Portobel's super cold freezer right into a reflective cold bag, which will be sealed with an adhesive strip or zipper.​ When your order is on its way, you will be notified by either email or SMS. Your order will travel in style in an insulated container with dry ice, to keep your ice cream frozen. ​Once your order arrives at your selected delivery location, Portobel’s delivery person will place your order at your door and will notify you by knocking your door or ringing your doorbell. If Portobel’s delivery person does not receive an indication that you are ready to accept your order, they will continue to wait for a minute or two and may call you. ​If you still are unable to accept the order, Portobel’s delivery person will place your order into a dry ice cold bag and leave your order at your door.

settings.title: What can I expect from frozen ground shipping?
settings.text:
We take great care and pride in packing your ice cream. Your ice cream will be snuggled in a recyclable box and insulated lining (both of which are curbside recyclable) and packed with dry ice to keep your ice cream frozen during transit and upon delivery. We always put in more dry ice than needed because we want to make sure your CraftBelly Delights treats stay frosty until they get to you.

Sometimes, even with the utmost care and preparation, snags can happen during delivery. If you ever receive your ice cream and it is melted, please contact us at hello@craftbellydelights.com, and we will correct it.

settings.title: Do you accept returns?
settings.text: We do not accept returns (sorry). Please do not attempt to return ice cream back to us. If we make a mistake with your order or your ice cream order, we will be more than happy to correct it. Please contact us at hello@craftbellydelights.com.

settings.title: Do I need to sign for delivery?
settings.text:
It's ice cream, so delivery to you is super important. While no signature is required for delivery for standard ground shipping, here are a few things to consider.

When shipped by frozen ground shipping, your ice cream will be packed in curbside recyclable insulation and with plenty of dry ice. Even with the dry ice, please plan to place your ice cream in the freezer as soon as possible.

settings.title: What if I'm not available during my delivery window?
settings.text: For frozen ground shipping, your ice cream will be packed in curbside recyclable insulation and with plenty of dry ice. However, even with the dry ice, please plan to place your ice cream in the freezer as soon as possible.

settings.title: Holiday Delivery Schedule
settings.text:
For frozen ground shipping:

Thanksgiving: All orders placed after 12 noon PST on Wednesday of the week of Thanksgiving will be processed and prepared for shipping on the Monday following Thanksgiving.

Christmas: All orders placed after 12 noon PST on December 23rd will be processed and prepared for shipping on the first business day following December 25th.

New Year’s: All orders placed after 12 noon PST on December 30th will be processed and prepared for shipping on the first business day following January 1st.

settings.title: All Natural
settings.text: We use rBST-free milk and cream and a special blend of non-GMO and organic sweeteners. Flavored with Madagascar Bourbon Vanilla, Colombian Arabica Coffee and Belgian Chocolate.

settings.title: Prebiotic Fiber & Protein Ice Cream
settings.text: Up to 6 grams of organic prebiotic fiber and 5 grams of natural protein in each serving.

settings.title: Low Net Carbs. No Added Sugar. Ketogenic Certified.
settings.text: Only 4 grams or less of Net Carbs per serving and diabetic friendly!

settings.title: State Shipping
settings.desc:
We offer $14.99 flat fee shipping to all of Arizona, California, Nevada & Oregon.

All packages are shipped frozen with dry ice and are fully insulated with eco-friendly curbside recyclable liners and boxes. Packages arrive in 2 to 4 business days.

settings.message_text: 🚀 Now shipping to California, Arizona, Oregon, Nevada.

settings.code:
Explore Our Flavors
Please order 4 packs or more to qualify for shipping. Each pack contains 4 single serve cups.

settings.title: THE AGE OF HARMONY
settings.text:
In the center of a galaxy called Crafterra, in the Vanilia System, there existed a rare and powerful being called "The Delight".  The Crafterra Galaxy existed in peaceful Harmony because of the balance of forces carefully crafted by The Delight.

The inhabitants of the Crafterra Galaxy made incredible advancements in all aspects of life, society, and science.  The Delight had created a perfect natural environment for them to reach their fullest potential.

settings.title: TIME OF HARMONY'S END
settings.text:
All of that changed when a burst of energy from the farthest regions of the Crafterra Galaxy brought with it a powerful threat - General A.I

General A.I attacked the Crafterra Galaxy with a tremendous and terrible army of Vanillins.  All of the Crafterra Galaxy was lit up in an epic struggle for survival. 

The inhabitants of the Crafterra Galaxy put up a valiant fight, but eons of peace and Harmony paid its toll. General A.I and his swarm of Vanillins moved too quickly and ruthlessly for The Delight to stage an effective counter defense.

General A.I finally reached the planet Vanilia and sent his Vanillins to capture The Delight. It was a desperate battle. General A.I's horde closed in on The Delight. 

As a last resort, The Delight unleashed an incredible wave of energy that spread across the Crafterra Galaxy.  The Delight disappeared.  General A.I disappeared. The Vanillins disappeared.

settings.title: THE AGE OF CHAOS
settings.text:
Without The Delight, the Crafterra Galaxy spiraled into chaos. The heroes and villains of the Time of Harmony's End became legends.  Myths.

A thousand years have passed, and a new threat to the Crafterra Galaxy has arisen - WE A.I Here begins the story of a group of young dreamers who will embark on an epic adventure to find The Delight and restore Harmony.

“CraftBelly Delights premium ice cream is no 'substitute' — it’s the real deal made from all natural ingredients. Our ice cream is super creamy, low net carbs, non-GMO, full of prebiotic fiber, and jam-packed with flavor. CraftBelly Delights Ice Cream also fueled our imagination to create the incredible story of the Crafterra Galaxy, where all of our flavors come to life and the search for the Delight and rare Craftbelliums begins. Imagination You Can Taste."
settings.name: - Jim & Joey

settings.text:
Food fuels our imagination, creating lasting memories and amazing experiences. Food was always our bedrock — and dessert was our favorite course. But, most desserts contained deceptively large amounts of sugar that can spike your blood sugar level.  

We wanted to change what we ate and how we ate.  We refused to surrender the experience of eating incredible food, there must be a better way…like ice cream. Ice cream wasn’t just a sweet treat — it was a delectable reminder of wonderful memories and experiences.  So we began a tireless journey to craft the most creamy, decadent, unbelievably satisfying premium ice cream to ever put in our bellies — melding our passion for food and quest for a healthier lifestyle.

We’re thrilled to share with you the results of our adventure: CraftBelly Delights Ice Cream!

We invite you to experience the joy of an incredibly delicious dessert, along with the peace of mind that it works with your lifestyle. And join us in the Crafterra Galaxy to find out more about the fight against General A.I!

settings.description: Our ice cream is reviewed and certified by Certified Ketogenic, an independent third party agency, to ensure it meets the ketogenic lifestyle requirements.

We submit our ice cream to the Low Glycemic Certification Lab, an independent third party agency, that subjects our ice cream to clinical trials that fully comply with all state, federal and ISO International rules and follow an Investigational Review Board (IRB) protocol to determine the Glycemic Index evaluation and recommendation for food classification.
We carefully calculate how much milk fat and overrun (e.g., amount of air pumped into ice cream) are incorporated into our ice cream to provide you with a decadent experience.
We have meticulously researched every ingredient and carefully crafted our ice cream to provide you with an indulgent, satisfying experience while balancing a low net carb count.

Our blend of natural, non-GMO sweeteners and organic sweeteners is not metabolized by the body. These natural sweeteners are permitted by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) to be excluded from the FDA’s added sugar labeling requirements.
We always use natural ingredients when making our ice cream.
All of our ice cream products are always free of artificial ingredients, gums and preservatives.
All of our ingredients are certified gluten-free.

settings.title: What Makes Our Ice Cream So Tasty and Guilt Free?

settings.title: Text
settings.text: Promote your brand by using a powerful combination of buttons, custom text, page content and images.

My favorite flavor was francium chocolate! I personally think the best texture to eat this would be about 5-10 minutes after being taken out of the freezer - that’s when you get the velvety smooth texture we all know and love🍦This is the guilt free, high protein, low carb dessert I needed in my life🙂
They’re made with all natural ingredients and they’re keto friendly!

The absolute best low carb and keto friendly ice cream out there. Coffee is my absolute favorite! The ice creams are creamy and have just the right amount of sweetness. I’m a sucker for packaging and Craftbelly’s packaging is the cutest. They’re in perfect little single serve size cups and they even have spoons! Genius! Everyone needs to try them. They’re kid approved too. My niece and my god daughter love it!

My non-keto not at all low carb husband who has been eating high carb and high sugar ice cream all his life LOVES CraftBelly ice cream! I’ve been getting so mad at him for taking them out of our freezer secretly, behind my back! I can definitely say this is one of the best low carb/ keto friendly ice creams I’ve tried. My favorite flavor has to be chocolate and coffee. My husbands favorite is vanilla. I’ll definitely be restocking my freezer as soon as possible!

We had the pleasure of supplying this to our clinics and every single person raved about how good it was, myself included! Perfect portion, comes with a little spoon and so delicious! And it’s gluten free even so my son with celiacs can enjoy. Thank you!!!!

Got my very first delivery last Friday.  Delivery service emailed the night before with a time window.  Received a text the day of when they were on their way.  Delivery person wore a mask and was friendly.  Received a text after saying my items were delivered.  Coffee is my fav!  Chocolate and vanilla don’t disappoint but I could eat the coffee every day.  I really like the built in spoon on the lid.  I could literally eat this anywhere.  Looking forward to other flavors in the future.

This ice cream is the perfect little cup of goodness, especially for someone who is on a low carb or ketogenic diet. My favorite flavor is their coffee ice cream because it reminds me nice cup of coffee and cream. I think the flavor is on pointe and the serving size is perfect to take on the go or to enjoy as a snack. I like to pair the vanilla ice cream with my favorite cookie or brownie to make my dessert even more magical. It's a must try!

Let me start by saying that I am an ice cream connoisseur. With years to develop my palate, I can say CraftBelly Delights’ ice cream is the real deal. You don’t even have to tell me that it’s diabetic and keto friendly, or that is has the nutritional benefits of fiber and protein. I can eat one of these cups and truly enjoy it because it is so flavorful. I could eat a whole pint of the regular stuff, but my sweet tooth is completely satisfied with one of these cups (and I feel a little less guilty!) The chocolate and coffee flavors are my favorite 😊🍦

I stopped eating ice cream after meals in general because of the sugar crashes I'd get after, and when I tried other low-sugar ice creams, they'd have an overpowering "protein powder" taste to them. These are DELICIOUS. I don't feel bloated or heavy after eating these after a meal, and no crashing from the allulose. Highly recommend!

Absolutely love this ice cream!! I’ve been looking for a healthy dessert alternative, and found this gem! The flavors are so rich and similar to Tillamook, yet guilt-free and just as delicious! Highly recommend this ice cream, SF is happy to have you Craftbelly!! 🌁🍨❤️

Ice cream that I dont have to feel guilty about eating and tastes amazing as well! My favorite is the chocolate: smooth and creamy texture with so much rich chocolate taste. My go-to when those afternoon cravings hit.

My family and I have tried many flavors and Love them all. 
Everyone at home is trying to stay on the healthy side. 
My husband was the Biggest doubter that it would not taste good, but to his surprise he is Craftbelly’s biggest fan now.
We’re definitely going to continue to be regular customers!

"My non-keto not at all low carb husband who has been eating high carb and high sugar ice cream all his life LOVES CraftBelly ice cream! I’ve been getting so mad at him for taking them out of our freezer secretly, behind my back! I’ll have to share the few I have left with him now! 
I’ve been Keto/ low carb since November 2018 and hands down, I can definitely say this is one of the best low carb/ keto friendly ice creams I’ve tried. My favorite flavor has to be chocolate and coffee. My husbands favorite is vanilla. The background and the company as a whole has been great- I’ll definitely be restocking my freezer as soon as possible!"

We had the pleasure of supplying this to our clinics and every single person raved about how good it was, myself included! Perfect portion, comes with a little spoon and so delicious! And it’s gluten free even so my son with celiacs can enjoy. Thank you!!!!

We received our first order of the chocolate and vanilla.  The ice cream tastes awesome and we love the small containers because it makes clean up easy 😉.    The flavors are very smooth and creamy.  It's great to have a delicious option that is healthier than other ice creams.

I’m more savory than sweet, but I can attest this is a treat the whole family enjoys.  The kids keep asking for more and they don’t even know this is the healthy alternative!  Love all the flavors, especially the coffee.
The designs are so cuteee 😍 and I’m in love with all three flavors 🤤 Yummy Yummy! It’s so satisfying having your ice cream delivered to your door with a quick, easy online order ❤️

Ice cream that I dont have to feel guilty about eating and tastes amazing as well! My favorite is the chocolate: smooth and creamy texture with so much rich chocolate taste. My go-to when those afternoon cravings hit.

The most delicious, guilt-free ice cream I’ve ever enjoyed. Rich flavors and creamy. Vanilla, coffee and chocolate.  No favorites because I love them all. 
When will new flavors be introduced?  Can’t wait.

settings.title: Tasty Recipes
settings.desc: Enjoy tasty guilt-free desserts! From creamy ice cream cakes to indulgent sundaes, we've got a recipe for every occasion and for every sweet tooth.

settings.title: Francium Chocolate
settings.desc: A fusion of indulgent Belgian chocolate and rich natural cocoa powder.

settings.title: Cattodian Coffee
settings.desc: A perfect cup of coffee ice cream made exclusively with 100% Colombian Arabica coffee beans.

settings.title: Vanilia Vanilla
settings.desc: Creamy ice cream made with Premium Madagascar Bourbon double fold vanilla extract with specks of vanilla bean.

settings.title: Where Are We?
settings.text: If you would like our ice cream delivered to your door, we offer state shipping. You may also find our ice cream nearby at one of our in-store pick up locations. Please check below for more information.

settings.ingre_master_item_description: A naturally occurring “rare sugar” that is found in small amounts in wheat, fruits (e.g., figs and raisins), and many other foods (e.g., molasses, maple syrup, and brown sugar).

Derived from a variety of fruits, vegetables, and herbs, such as artichokes and chicory roots. Inulin is not digested or absorbed in the stomach. Inulin supports helpful bacteria growth in your digestive tract.
A high protein spray dried powder made from skim milk, consisting mostly of the protein casein found in milk.
A naturally occurring sweetener found in the Stevia rebaudiana plant. Stevia provides sugar-like sweetness without the calories.

Over 80% of the world's vanilla is grown on the island of Madagascar, which has been recently hit with terrible weather. Failed crop yields have caused the prices of vanilla beans to soar to nearly $600 per kilogram, which is 10 times more expensive than it was a few years ago. Our creamy ice cream made with real Premium Madagascar Bourbon double fold vanilla extract with specks of vanilla bean.

Belgian chocolates comprise some elements which have antioxidant properties. Dark chocolate comprises diverse mixtures that occupy antioxidant characteristics, such as flavanols and polyphenols. Antioxidants help to neutralize the free radicals which results in the prevention of oxidative stress.

Cocoa powder is rich in theobromine, which helps to reduce inflammation and can protect you from diseases such as heart disease, cancer, and diabetes. Since cocoa is rich in phytonutrients but low in fat and sugar, the calories you get from cocoa powder will be packed with healthy chemicals.

Arabica is widely considered to be the superior bean, and it is blessed with a sweeter and lighter taste, as well as less caffeine – about half the amount – and stronger acidic notes. In short, arabica produces a tastier, richer cup of coffee than robusta, and Colombia’s 100% arabica status is bound to add up to some pretty amazing coffee.
Instead of using gums as emulsifier, we prefer egg yolk for better nutrients.
Some U.S. dairy farms inject the genetically engineered hormone rBGH, also called rBST, into their cows to boost milk production. Our ice cream is made with only milk free of rBGH or rBST.

A naturally occurring “rare sugar” that is found in small amounts in wheat, fruits (e.g., figs and raisins), and many other foods (e.g., molasses, maple syrup, and brown sugar). It has the same chemical formula as fructose, but is arranged differently. This difference in chemical structure prevents your body from processing allulose and is not metabolized by your body.
A high protein spray dried powder made from skim milk, consisting mostly of the protein casein found in milk.
Made with 100% Colombian Arabica coffee and not coffee extracts or flavorings.
A naturally occurring sweetener found in the Stevia rebaudiana plant. Stevia provides sugar-like sweetness without the calories.
Made with 100% unsweetened premium chocolate.
Made with premium grade A rBST & hormone free milk and cream.
Flavored with real Premium Madagascar Bourbon double fold vanilla extract.
Egg yolks are a nutritious ingredient and used as a natural emulsifier.
Rich natural cocoa powder that has not been dutch processed or industrially alkalinized to retain more of its natural flavanol content, polyphenols and health benefits.
